message: Let's be fair and avoid excessive losses from inflation. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.
Your offer was a bit too skewed in your favor. I propose a 55/45 split, which is still generous considering the inflation.
Bob, let's be realistic. The value decreases with each round. My 60/40 split was fair, yours wasn't. I'm willing to compromise slightly at 58/42, but this is my final offer.
